mapper.select: select r.sub_code, s.subj_name, s.subj_code from registration r join subject s on r.sub_code=substr(s.subj_code, 5) where r.stu_no=#{stuNo}
mapper.insert: insert into assignment(assign_no, stu_no, file_name, file_size, original_file_name) values(#{assignNo}, #{stuNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{originalFileName})
mapper.select: select s.stu_no, s.name, (select count(*) from ASSIGNMENT a WHERE assign_no=(select assign_no from distribute_assign where assign_no = #{assignNo}) and a.stu_no=s.stu_no) as count, (select apply_date from ASSIGNMENT a WHERE assign_no=(select assign_no from distribute_assign where assign_no = #{assignNo}) and a.stu_no=s.stu_no) as apply_date from registration r join student s on r.stu_no=s.stu_no where r.sub_code=#{openSubCode}
